general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Electrical permits required. No specific solar license. All work must be done by licensed electrical contractors. PE stamps for systems >12-15 kW.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 50 kW. Appalachian Power and Mon Power primary utilities.

special_considerations.historic_districts: Historic districts may require additional review.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 85-100 mph.

licensing.license_type: Licensed electrical contractor required. No specific solar license.

notes: Very low solar adoption. Limited incentives. Net metering available but export rates are low. Coal-dominant energy market transitioning slowly.
